description: A third is sometimes fun, but every once and awhile you want to experience someone new without your other half tagging along. That’s how Rafael Lords is feeling, and Spencer Whitman is more than happy to help him out with the desire. He enjoys the experience: check out his face at 13:55 as he reaches for the headboard. And the torso shot that follows right after is just as visually captivating -- you can’t miss Spencer Whitman’s gorgeous furry chest at 14:05.
title: Spencer Whitman Pounds Rafael Lords Bareback
